page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: WATER SPORTS These are well catered for in the area as there are several ex-gravel pits that are used for angling, wind-surfing and water ski-ing. TEAM GAMES There are facilities for football and cricket and the village has teams for both sports. RACKET GAMES Badminton can be played in the village hall. There are facilities for playing squash and tennis. OTHER RECREATIONS These include bowling, snooker, table tennis and weight-lifting. There is a social club at the village hall a branch of the Young Farmers and the hall is used for dances.
